snippet: President Obama’s campaign ratcheted up its assault on Mitt Romney’s record as governor of Massachusetts on Monday.
abstract: Text and assessment of Pres Obama's campaign advertisement claiming that Mitt Romney was responsible for the loss of 40,000 manufacturing jobs when he was governor of Massachusetts; ad is scheduled to be broadcast in nine battleground states.
